casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Kushawn S. MILES, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157223
COA: 340340 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the February 1, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court. The motion for remand is DENIED.
